TextView.android:text: Lois Mitchell is an accomplished businesswoman and a proud, longstanding member of Alberta's dedicated corps of community volunteers. She began her duties as the 18th Lieutenant Governor of Alberta on June 12, 2015. Her Honour has chosen to make history education a focus during her tenure in office and is Founding Patron of the History and Heroes Foundation.
